name: test_e2e_with_logs[377_LDAP_BASIC_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `LDAP_BASIC_003` |
| **Name** | LDAP admin account injection |
| **Category** | LDAP |
| **Subcategory** | basic_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `admin)(&(password=*)`
- **Encoded**: `admin)(%26(password%3D*)`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~49000ms
